item.title: IBM
item.description: score:-31 Chances: IBM is repositioned for substantial growth, thanks in part to its use of AI. The Consulting segment focuses on integrating skills on strategy, experience, technology and operations, which could drive future growth. Risks: The booing of AI speakers at South by Southwest may indicate public skepticism towards AI, which could affect IBMâ€™s AI-focused initiatives.
